1:
The earth and everything in it belongs to Yahweh;\q2 all the people in the world belong to him, too;
\q1
2:
he built the land on the water,\q2 above the water that is deep below.



\q1
3:
Who will be allowed to go up onto Mount Zion in Jerusalem,\q2 in order to stand and worship in Yahweh's holy temple?
\q1
4:
Only those whose actions and thoughts are pure,\q2 who have not worshiped idols,
\q2 and who do not tell lies when they have solemnly promised to tell the truth.


\q1
5:
Yahweh will bless them.\q1 When God judges them, he will rescue them and say that they have done nothing wrong.
\q1
6:
They are the people who come to God,\q2 they are the ones who desire to worship God,
\q2 and serve the God of Jacob.



\q1
7:
Open up the temple gates\q2 in order that our glorious king may enter!
\q1
9:
Open up the temple gates\q2 in order that our glorious king may enter!
\q1
10:
Do you know who the glorious king is?\q2 It is Yahweh, commander of the angel armies;
\q2 he is our glorious king!
